name: EXPEST
description:
It's easier when you're the one with the upper hand.




Be a pest!
In this arcade-inspired game, fulfill your desires and collect all the cheese in 80 designed levels to test your puzzle solving skills.

Don't get caught!
There's a specialized hunter with the sole purpose of hunting you down. Use your reflexes to avoid all their traps and turrets.

Easy to learn, hard to master!
With simple controls, it doesn't take long for you to understand how to play. But how you use it is another matter.
